text: Samantha'Sweetheart'Giancola was the only cast member who didn't return for MTV's revival of ` ` Jersey Shore,'' dubbed ` ` Jersey Shore : Family Vacation,'' but she definitely paid attention to Thursday's premiere on Twitter. Though she didn't tweet much about the show herself, her the tweets she liked were very, very telling. While the show was airing on the East Coast, Giancola tweeted out a message of support to just one of her former costars : Deena Nicole Cortese. ` ` I love my @ DeenaNicoleMTV,'' she wrote. She then went on a liking spree, sending love to a ton of tweets with shady references to both the show
